item.title: building emacs for macos
item.description: my copy of emacs installed through homebrew was acting up: everytime i tried to click the “markdown” menu when editing a markdown’ed text file, emacs would terminate rather abruptly (aka crash). decidedly not nice. so: try to reinstall… a couple of hours later this is the recipe that worked for me: > brew install --with-modern-icon --without-spacemacs-icon --with-mailutils --with-jansson --HEAD emacs-plus followed by option-cmd dragging the generated /usr/local/opt/emacs-plus/Emacs.app to /Applications, and allowing Emacs full-disk access macos security setings for emacs
